markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Elusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1807) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

**Trigger**
A foe ends its movement adjacent to you.

</column>

---

Attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check against the foe's Reflex DC. If you succeed, either Stride to a different space adjacent to the foe or move the foe to a different space adjacent to you.
name: Swift Elusion
